title: Ticket #6527: turn a set of startd ads into SUBMIT_REQUIREMENTS statements
description:
for SWAMP, and for personal condors and other very small pools, it would be nice to have a tool that can generate a SUBMIT_REQUIREMENT configuration from a set of STARTD ads (or perhaps from the config statements that the startd uses) so that a job could not be submitted to the schedd if it did not match any of the resources in the pool.

I propose putting this code into condor_status since it already has most of what is needed - although much of the work should actually be in condor_utils so that it could be possibly be done automatically by the schedd at some point in the future.
